page_content:
Selex ES Ltd

CHECK Perimeter Integrity Test

Perimeter Integrity Testing focuses on identifying and addressing areas of security risk to the configuration, integrity and availability of client perimeter systems. It’s designed to identify any potential for perimeter exploitation within the external security measures implemented by an organisation and thereby ensure such devices are configured to best practice.

Features

  • 18 years delivering penetration test services within CESG CHECK guidelines
  • Delivered by Full time Selex CHECK Team Leads and Members
  • Testing of external encryption schemes and all network boundary devices
  • Configuration reviews of VPN & IDS boundary protection devices
  • Rulebase reviews of Firewalls including exposure testing
  • Network Topology advice for best practice ‘defence in depth’ architecture
  • We adapt approach to fit the organisation specific requirements
  • Fit for purpose reporting tailored to a client’s organisational needs
  • CVSS driven risk rating to ensure consistency of issue delivery
  • Clear, precise recommendations specific to that organisations environment

Benefits

  • Permanent Selex ES employees who are CESG CHECK Scheme accredited
  • An affordable, highly reliable and respected service offering
  • Effective and secure perimeter configuration realised
  • Identification of Perimeter issues and vulnerabilities before they impact operations
  • Protecting the client boundary or perimeter against security bypass
  • Peace of mind though an enhanced configuration of perimeter security
  • Assessment performed against all recognised industry best practices and accreditations
  • Quick wins identifying errors in device configuration and insecure practices
  • Skills transfer to client offered as part of test engagement
  • Supported by In House SOC and CLAS Accredited Professionals

Pricing

£583 to £1326 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
